fields.label: Form Action URL
fields.name: contactFormActionUrl
fields.hint: The URL to which the contact form is submitted.

fields.label: Form Method Attribute (Synchronous Only)
fields.name: contactFormMethod
fields.hint: Set the HTTP method attribute for the form. Generally this will be POST (default) or GET. Does not apply if the form is sent asynchronously (see below). This attribute will be given to the HTML <form> tag itself.

fields.label: Form Name Attribute
fields.name: contactFormNameAttribute
fields.hint: The name attribute for the form. This attribute will be given to the HTML <form> tag itself.

fields.label: Send Form Asynchronously (No Page Reload)
fields.name: contactFormAsyncEnabled
fields.hint: When switched on, the form will be sent asynchronously with the POST method. Turning this on generally creates a better user experience. When off, the browser will submit using the method above and the page will do a full reload. (Async uses the browser Fetch API. For advanced configuration options, see the documentation)

fields.label: Fields
fields.name: fields
fields.hint: You can have as many fields as you'd like. At a minimum, most contact forms have a name, email, and message.

fields.label: Field Label Text
fields.name: label
fields.hint: The label text shown for the field. Examples: Name, Email, Subject, Message

fields.label: Field Name Attribute
fields.name: nameAttribute
fields.hint: The name attribute for this field. Must be unique among the other fields! Examples: name, emailAddress, subject, message

fields.label: Initial Value
fields.name: initialValue
fields.hint: The initial value for the field.

fields.label: Field Type
fields.name: type
fields.hint: Select the type of field. Text fields are a single line, email fields will be validated by the browser automatically, and text areas offer multple lines of input.

fields.label: Field Placeholder Text
fields.name: placeholder
fields.hint: The placeholder text shown in the field when nothing has been entered yet.

fields.label: Required?
fields.name: required
fields.hint: Whether this will be a required field or not. If required, the form will not submit until it has been filled in.

fields.label: Required Field Error Text
fields.name: requiredErrorText
fields.hint: The error message shown when a required field is not filled in. The browser may override this message with its own.

fields.label: Submit Button Text
fields.name: submitButtonText
fields.hint: The text used on the submit button.
